text:
<@U25PYL3Q8>
I am trying to create a custom ui extension with a serverless function. I am running into the following error:
[Warning] [blocked] The page at <https://app.HubSpot.com/contacts/46892574/record/0-2/22083996783> was not allowed to display insecure content from <http://localhost:5173/extensions>. (bundle.production.js, line 345)
This seems to be because I am using localhost, which is considered insecure.


Now I am also experiencing a CSP error in trying to connect the react frontend to the serverless function.
[Error] Refused to connect to <https://static.HubSpot-extensions.com/_hcms/api/functions/handleDashboardData> because it does not appear in the connect-src directive of the Content Security Policy.
I'm not sure what I could be doing wrong in this regard. I'm still rather new to all of this.

These are the errors I'm getting atm..
[Debug] {} (start.js, line 141)
[Info] Successfully preconnected to <https://static.hsappstatic.net/>

I am currently trying to use ngrok to see if I can deal with the https issue. Does that make sense to do?
